articles.title: Carlo Acutis: From London baptism to first millennial saint - BBC
articles.description: Before his death at 15, Carlo Acutis was known for his love of technology and had created a website to document miracles.
articles.content:

Carlo Acutis will become the first millennial saint
A London-born boy is set to become the first millennial saint, in a ceremony steeped in an ancient ritual presid… [+3433 chars]

articles.title: EU fines Google $3.5B over adtech ‘abuse’ - TechCrunch
